aboutText.text: I'm a passionate3 Full Stack Developer from Sathyamangalam, India, currently working at Thoughtworks. I love transforming complex challenges into elegant, user-friendly solutions.

With expertise in modern web technologies, I specialize in building scalable applications that deliver exceptional user experiences. My approach combines clean code, innovative thinking, and a keen eye for detail to create solutions that make a difference.

specialAwards.name: ISTE Best Student Award 2021
specialAwards.details: 20th Annual Student Convention, RAMCO Institute of Technology
specialAwards.description: Join me in celebrating a proud moment as I was honored with the prestigious "ğ™¸ğš—ğšğš’ğšŠğš— ğš‚ğš˜ğšŒğš’ğšğšğš¢ ğšğš˜ğš› ğšƒğšğšŒğš‘ğš—ğš’ğšŒğšŠğš• ğ™´ğšğšğšŒğšŠğšğš’ğš˜ğš—" (ğˆğ’ğ“ğ„) - the Best Student Award 2021. This esteemed recognition was bestowed upon me during the 20th Annual Student Convention at the esteemed RAMCO INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY in Rajapalayam. This accolade stands as a testament to my dedication to academic excellence, prowess in co-curricular activities, and commendable performance in various club engagements. It was indeed a moment of great privilege to have my parents accompany me to this prestigious award ceremony, adding to the significance of the occasion. Join me as I cherish this milestone in my educational journey, embodying the spirit of excellence and commitment to learning.
